## New York City Police Department (NYPD)

The NYPD is New York City's biggest and oldest police force, founded in 1845. It has over 40,000 employees, including 30,000+ officers, and responds to hundreds of thousands of crimes yearly. The NYPD has special units for emergencies, K-9s, harbor patrol, and more. It's headquartered in Lower Manhattan. Despite some controversies around brutality and corruption, the NYPD is often featured in movies, TV, and games.
